title: in need of a ride: sandusky to nyc (sandusky oh)
shortDescription:
hello, 
i and my wife in our mid 50s looking to share a ride to new york city anytime from now to hopefully soon. we are non smokers and don't mind if you do, friendly and very respectful. we are willing to share the gas cost. please let us know with [...]

title: limo ride to cleveland or akron (new london)
shortDescription: i have a older limo with ins. and limo tags willing to give you a 1 way or round trip to cleveland or akron or sandusky mansfild ashland you let me know where you need to go and i will give you a price thanks

title: ohio to az end of nov (northern ohio)
shortDescription: i am going to be in ohio until after thanksgiving ( 23rd or 24th) and then heading out to arizona. i have a small suv and may be able to take one person and some luggage. i have not chosen my route yet so i may be flexible if someone needs a ride to  [...]

title: driving to nyc oct 25-29th (oh)
shortDescription: hi! i'm going from sandusky to nyc oct 25-29th. i will probably do all the driving but just need 1 or 2 people to chip in for gas! just be sane, preferably female, and not mind listening to books on tape!

title: ohio to western pa (port clinton)
shortDescription: traveling from ohio to pa sundays in october back this way on tuesdays usually. need a rid hit me up usually depart the sandusky area around 3:00
